html:
For today only, B&H Photo has some Studio 26 bags on sale for great savings. The bags are all $49, saving you $130. This is a good time to get a new camera bag—just because.

Studio 26 Solecarry /26 Duffel Bag (Khaki/Saddle)

There are two different bags for sale: the Stone/Black bag and also the Khaki/Saddle coloured bag.

Key features;

  • Holds DSLR, 2 Lenses & Accessories
  • Exterior and Interior Pockets
  • Removable Padded Foldable Insert
  • Top Strap Handles
  • Rubber Bottom Panel
  • Canvas/Leather Construction

Studio 26 SOLEPACK/26 Backpack (Charcoal/Black)

Key features include;

  • Holds DSLR, Two Lenses & Personal Gear
  • Padded 13″ Tablet/Laptop Sleeve
  • Removable Padded Foldable Insert
  • Exterior Zip Pockets
  • Side Pocket for Water Bottle
  • Padded Touch-Fastened Interior Dividers
  • Backpack Straps & Top Handle
  • Rubber Bottom Panel
  • Canvas/Leather Construction

When you purchase through links on our site, we may earn an affiliate commission. Here's how it works.
